column1: A funeral service for Edd Snodgrass will be held Wednesday
column3: at 11:00 a.m. at the Hall Funeral Chapel in Auburn
column4: NE. burial will follow at the Johnson Cemetery in Johnson
column5: NE. Graveside Military Honors provided by Nebraska National Guard Honor Guard and local American Legion.  Visitation will be Tuesday
column7: from 4 p.m. to 8 p.m. at the Hall Funeral Chapel in Auburn. Family will greet friends from 5 p.m. to 6
